div.div: Overlap between the at-sea home-ranges of 50 GPS-tracked Cape gannets in Oct-Nov 2017 (90% kernel distributions, dotted lines) and average annual hake catch by trawlers in 2008â€“2015 (log tonnes+1; orange dots).
div.p: The size of orange dots increases with catch value from 0.17 to 6.53. White dots represent no catch in the fishing area. Blue shades indicate bathymetry (R package marmap).
